info.name: englisttohindi
info.summary: Convert English to Hindi with this Python Package it return String  useful for NLP Projects
info.html_description:
[]

englisttohindi

what is englisttohindi ?

  • It converts your English String into Hindi String
  • application can be to convert dataset into hindi and train NLP Models
  • This Module is based on web scrapping

Dependencies

pip install requests

Installation

pip install englisttohindi

Usage

from englisttohindi.englisttohindi import EngtoHindi
trans = EngtoHindi(message="Hello  Everyone  ")
print(trans.convert)
